text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.238 where concept is-a 1000-9

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.238
    CodeDisplay
    1002-5American Indian or Alaska NativeAmerican Indian or Alaska Native
    2028-9AsianAsian
    2054-5Black or African AmericanBlack or African American
    2076-8Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific IslanderNative Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
    2106-3WhiteWhite

name: DetailedRace
title: Detailed Race
description: The 900+ [CDC Race codes](http://www.cdc.gov/phin/resources/vocabulary/index.html) that are grouped under one of the 5 OMB race category codes.
